column4: hello, can i get my NVIDIA 680i onboard sound (High definition audio) to work over SPDIF?
there should be an option in alsa-mixer
i am able to listen over the analog connections just fine, just SPDIF was not detected i will look into those links though, thank you
yeaha you have to sort of turn on the right options in the alsa mixer, it's probably easier to use the gnome version but i found that the command line one had more controlls on it
